Segment.name: W12
Segment.comment: To designate those line items that were shipped

Field.name: ShipmentOrderStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

Field.name: QuantityOrdered
Field.comment: Quantity ordered

Field.name: NumberOfUnitsShipped
Field.comment: Numeric value of units shipped in manufacturer's shipping units for a line item or transaction set

Field.name: QuantityDifference
Field.comment: Numeric value of variance between ordered and shipped quantities

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UPCCaseCode1
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) including two high order digits identifying the "system" (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07; U.S. Drug = 03); using the U.S. Grocery system, the next ten digits are: Manufacturer (5) Case Code (5)

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId1
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: WarehouseLotNumber
Field.comment: Reference number assigned by the warehouse

Field.name: Weight1
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight

Field.name: WeightQualifier1
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: WeightUnitCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the weight unit

Field.name: Weight2
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight

Field.name: WeightQualifier2
Field.comment: Code defining the type of weight

Field.name: WeightUnitCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the weight unit

Field.name: UPCCaseCode2
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) including two high order digits identifying the "system" (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07; U.S. Drug = 03); using the U.S. Grocery system, the next ten digits are: Manufacturer (5) Case Code (5)

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId2
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: LineItemChangeReasonCode
Field.comment: Code defining reason for any difference between quantity ordered and quantity shipped for a line item

Field.name: WarehouseDetailAdjustmentIdentifier
Field.comment: Code to identify detail line item as an adjustment to inventory levels

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier3
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId3
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service
